Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +4
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Deny Advantage: Foes of equal or lower level cannot inflict flat-footed
Poison Weapon: May apply poison to piercing and slashing weapons
Sneak Attack: +1d6 damage vs. flat-footed foe with agile, finesse, or projectile weapons
Surprise Attack: May use Deception or Stealth for initiative to inflict flat-footed on creature that haven't acted
Thief: -1 damage with finesse weapons
Twin Feint: May Strike with each hand, inflicting flat-footed on the second
Unbalancing Blow: Critical hits inflict flat-footed vs. self attacks for 1 rd

Save Notes: Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. control are critical successs/Foe Intimidation (Coerce) fails are critical fails
Magic
Magic Notes: Magical Trickster: Spell attacks vs. flat-footed foe inflict sneak attack damage
